name: UnifiedAttribute
description: A unified attribute for the Image Button

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the button
default: 30.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the button
default: 30.0

content.name: hoverable
content.description:
whether the button will respond to mouse hover events
default: true

content.name: selectable
content.description:
whether the button will be selectable
default: true

content.name: pressable
content.description:
whether the button will be pressable
default: true

content.name: style__off
content.description:
the style of the button when it is deactivated
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__up
content.description:
the style of the button when no actions are applied to the button
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__press
content.description:
the style of the button when it is pressed
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__select
content.description:
the style of the button when it is selected
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__select_press
content.description:
the style of the button when it is selected and pressed
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__glow
content.description:
the style of the button when it is glowing
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__glow_press
content.description:
the style of the button when it is glowing and pressed
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__glow_select
content.description:
the style of the button when it is glowing and selected
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__glow_select_press
content.description:
the style of the button when it is glowing, selected and pressed
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__hover
content.description:
the style of the button when it is being hovered over
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__hover_press
content.description:
the style of the button when it is being hovered over and is pressed
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__hover_select
content.description:
the style of the button when it is being hovered over and is selected
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__hover_select_press
content.description:
the style of the button when it is being hovered over, is selected and is pressed
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__hover_glow
content.description:
the style of the button when it is being hovered over and is glowing
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__hover_glow_press
content.description:
the style of the button when it is being hovered over, is glowing and is pressed
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__hover_glow_select
content.description:
the style of the button when it is being hovered over, is glowing and is selected
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__hover_glow_select_press
content.description:
the style of the button when it is being hovered over, is glowing, is selected and is pressed
default: the "no image" image
